languages.text: Until the end of combat, the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +30%.
languages.original_text: До конца боя {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельность{/g} солдата возрастает на 30%.

traits.locale_text: Until the end of combat, the Marksman's rate of fire is increased by +30%.
Until the end of combat, the Marksman's rate of fire is increased by +30%.
Until the end of combat, the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +30%.
Until the end of combat, the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +30%.

languages.text: До конца боя {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельность{/g} солдата возрастает на 30%.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +30%.

traits.locale_text: До конца боя скорострельность стрелка возрастает на 30%.
До конца боя скорострельность стрелка возрастает на 30%.

languages.text: 士兵的{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}提高30%，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +30%.

traits.locale_text: 士兵的{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}提高30%，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Hasta el final del combate, la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} del soldado aumenta en un +30 %.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +30%.

traits.locale_text: Hasta el final del combate, la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} del tirador de élite aumenta en un +30 %.

languages.text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erhöht sich die {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuergeschwindigkeit{/g} des Soldaten um +30 %.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +30%.

traits.locale_text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erhöht sich die {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuergeschwindigkeit{/g} des Scharfschützen um +30 %.

languages.text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} du soldat augmente de 30 %.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +30%.

traits.locale_text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} du Tireur d'Élite augmente de +30 %.

languages.text: 戦闘終了まで、兵士の{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}発射速度{/g}が+30%増加する。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +30%.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘終了まで、兵士の{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}発射速度{/g}が+30%増加する。

languages.text: Asker'in {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}atış hızı{/g} +%30 artar. Etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +30%.
